title: JavaScript
details: Lightweight interpreted scripting language for dynamic interfaces, event handling, and full-stack web apps.
source: Full-stack MERN apps (React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB), frontend interactivity, personal website development

title: HTML
details: Markup language used to structure web pages and applications.
source: JSX for React components, raw HTML layout and HTTP response rendering (custom server)

title: CSS
details: Styling language used to design and control the visual presentation of HTML elements.
source: Styling frontend web apps using raw CSS, Flexbox/Grid, and Material UI

title: WebAssembly
details: Low-level binary instruction format designed as a portable compilation target for high-performance applications running in the browser.
source: Used to demo C-based emulators and systems projects in a web environment
